attributes.additional_details: The European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2019 was voted on by the HoC & rushed through the HoL gaining Royal Assent by the Queen. This won favour in the HoC by One Vote. One MP in favour was Electonically Monitored or “Tagged”. Prisoners have No Right to vote. The Extention to Article 50 on the 11th April could NOT have been rejected by Teresa May due to this Law. For Brexit to take place and to save time for the Treasonous MPs continuing to undemocratically disallow Brexit - Please Sign.
attributes.background: The European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2019 was voted on by the HoC & rushed through the HoL before gaining Royal Assent by the Queen. By repealing this Law - Leaving the EU without a Deal will once again become a possibility preserving Democracy for future generations. Please Sign.
